programme.desc: More tasty treats from Theo Randall, Julius Roberts, Loyle Carner, Josh Niland and Sabrina Ghayour. Meanwhile, Rick Stein and Clive Myrie head out across the UK and abroad.

programme.title: Nadiyas British Food Adventure
programme.desc: Nadiya heads to London to discover cutting edge food, from salad `fed by fish poo to a chef using fragrance to flavour his food. She cooks a pistacho cake and a curry on a roof top.

programme.title: School for Scoundrels
programme.desc: British comedy about a born loser who enrols at the College of Lifemanship and turns his life around by learning how to charm and cheat his way to the top with the minimum of effort. Adapted from the `Oneupmanship books by Stephen Potter.

programme.title: Natural World
programme.sub-title: Victoria Falls: The Smoke That Thunders
programme.desc: A tale of life on the Zambezi River, set against the epic backdrop of Victoria Falls. The story is told from the point of view of a local fisherman, Mr White, who has fished these waters for 69 years, and whose riverside companions are elephants, baboons, hippos and kingfishers. Follow the fortunes of these animals through his eyes.

programme.title: The Train
programme.desc: A true story of wartime heroism about a French railway inspector who goes up against the Nazis in order to prevent a trainload of Frances most treasured paintings from being stolen.

programme.title: UCI Track Cycling World Championships LIVE
programme.desc: JJ Chalmers presents live coverage of the final day of the Track Cycling World Championships in Chile, with British medal hopes in the womens keirin and the mens sprint.

programme.title: Worlds Most Dangerous Roads
programme.desc: Actor Will Mellor cajoles comedian and good friend Keith Lemon into joining him on a high-octane Albanian road trip.

programme.title: Top Gear
programme.desc: Jeremy Clarkson attempts to build a car thats even smaller than the famous Peel P50. He then tests it out on the streets of London before putting his concept to the ultimate test of credibility in the fearsome `Dragons Den. Meanwhile, James May is testing the latest Bentley Continental GT Speed by taking it on a rally stage. Plus, Richard Hammond is at the test track to unleash the sensational new Pagani Huayra hypercar.

programme.title: Mortimer and Whitehouse: Gone Fishing
programme.sub-title: River Itchen, Hampshire - Wild Brown Trout
programme.desc: Paul and Bob travel to Hampshire to fly fish in the idyllic River Itchen with their trusty canine friend Ted in tow.

programme.title: Daisy May and Charlie Coopers NightWatch
programme.desc: Daisy May and Charlie Cooper spend the night in Gloucesters former Prison. Will the siblings experience any ghostly bumps in the night, and can they make it to morning?

programme.title: Later ... with Jools Holland
programme.desc: Jools Holland brings together hot, legendary and undiscovered artists for live studio performances, interviews and musical magic.

programme.title: Blinded by the Light
programme.desc: A Pakistani teenager experiences racial and economic turmoil in working-class England in 1987. He soon gathers the courage to find his own voice and follow his dreams after discovering the inspirational music of Bruce Springsteen.

programme.title: Question Time
programme.desc: Features a studio audience quizzing top politicians on the events of the day. The panel surrounding presenter Fiona Bruce is composed of at least one member of the three major parties.

programme.title: Blue Lights
programme.desc: For three police recruits in Belfast, the pressure is immense. Facing criminal gangs and divided communities, they dont know who to trust.

programme.title: Leonard and Hungry Paul
programme.desc: After his mothers death, Leonard begins to open up his world with the help of a new colleague, Shelley. His best friend, Hungry Paul, reluctantly volunteers at the hospital.

programme.title: This Is BBC TWO
programme.desc: Preview of upcoming programmes from BBC Two.

programme.title: Antiques Roadshow
programme.desc: The roadshow is at Shuttleworth House in Bedfordshire, where highlights include gorgeous diamond earrings, a lunar souvenir and an umbrella stand in the shape of a bear.

programme.title: Match of the Day
programme.desc: Highlights of five Premier League matches, including Arsenal v Crystal Palace at the Emirates and Aston Villa v Manchester City. Elsewhere, Bournemouth take on Nottingham Forest, Everton host Spurs, and Wolves chase a first home win of the season against newly promoted Burnley.

programme.title: BBC News
programme.desc: Twenty-four hours a day, the latest national and international stories as they break.

programme.title: Politics Live
programme.desc: Jo Coburn invites a panel of guests to share their opinions on the newsmaking stories of the day.

programme.title: Impossible
programme.desc: Thirty players compete across the series, scoring points by answering questions correctly. However, they must avoid the impossible answers, otherwise they will be eliminated from the show until the next day.

programme.title: The Finish Line
programme.desc: Roman Kemp and sidekick Sarah Greene host the quiz show where contestants race on moving podiums across the studio floor. Correct answers get the players moving, while wrong answers will stop them in their tracks.

programme.title: Unbeatable
programme.desc: Today, Candice, Esther, Craig and Shaun battle it out to see which one of them is unbeatable.

programme.title: Great British Menu
programme.desc: Its judging day, and only one chef can go through to represent south west England. Former director of public health for Wiltshire Professor Tracy Daszkiewicz helps decide the winner.

programme.title: Wonders of the Monsoon
programme.desc: On the Indonesian island of Sulawesi, black crested macaques thrive in large troops. They are amongst the most `loving of monkeys, showing affection not just amongst close family, but across the whole group.

programme.title: Flog It!
programme.desc: `Flog It! comes from the beautiful St Albans Cathedral and Abbey in Hertfordshire. Antique experts Claire Rawle and James Lewis are on hand to value antiques and collectibles. James comes across a pipe shaped like a polar explorer, and Claire discovers salt and pepper pots shaped like suffragettes.

programme.title: Richard Osmans House of Games
programme.desc: Jack Carroll, Dani Harmer, Dominic Littlewood and Shivi Ramoutar test their general knowledge skills on this weeks House of Games.

programme.title: Strictly Come Dancing: It Takes Two
programme.desc: Fleur East kicks off the week with an exclusive chat with the latest couple to leave the competition. Plus more interviews and backstage gossip from some of the weekends surviving couples.

programme.title: Global Eye
programme.desc: Bringing forensic journalism from all corners of the world by BBC Eye, the World Services critically acclaimed investigative unit, and featuring expert global correspondents getting to the heart of the biggest international stories.

programme.title: Mastermind
programme.desc: Clive Myrie hosts the classic quiz where contenders take on the famous black chair. Specialist subjects include the musical Les Miserables, Florence Nightingale and The O.C.

programme.title: Only Connect
programme.desc: Victoria Coren Mitchell hosts the quiz where knowledge only gets you so far. No elimination this time: the winners go through, but the losing team gets to play again later in the series.

programme.title: University Challenge
programme.desc: Two more of the highest-scoring losing teams from the heats compete for the final second round place. Amol Rajan asks the questions.

programme.title: Once Upon a Time in Space
programme.desc: The human story of space exploration. Personal accounts from astronauts and scientists, covering key milestones, global space rivalries and the future of humanity beyond Earth.

programme.title: Leonard and Hungry Paul
programme.desc: Leonard tries to expand his universe and speak to Shelley. However, he accidentally ends up on a date with another woman. Meanwhile, Hungry Paul enters an exciting competition.

programme.title: Newsnight
programme.desc: Featuring extensive coverage of the days top national and international news stories, along with explanations about the context and potential aftereffects.

programme.title: BBC Weather
programme.desc: The latest weather forecast.

programme.title: The Others
programme.desc: A tightly wound widow begins to unravel as strange occurrences point to the presence of ghosts in her isolated mansion.

programme.title: Countryfile
programme.desc: Charlotte Smith, Matt Baker and Adam Henson are in Kent to explore the influence of France on the Garden of England.

programme.title: The Celebrity Traitors
programme.desc: As the drama continues, the question on everyones lips is which celebrity was murdered, and could it lead them to a Traitor?

programme.title: The Celebrity Traitors: Uncloaked
programme.desc: Ed Gamble is joined by the latest banished and murdered players as he tells them the identity of the Traitors for the first time.

programme.title: Shaun the Sheep
programme.desc: Childrens animation featuring the adventures of Shaun and his flock, under the watchful eye of sheepdog Bitzer. The farmers tractor wont start, so when his back is turned Shaun and the other sheep give it a quick makeover.

programme.desc: Dennis recruits Grizzly Griller to help make school sports day more extreme, but as he and JJ get competitive against each other, who is sabotaging both their chances of winning?

programme.sub-title: The Dark Lord Cometh - Part l

programme.sub-title: The Dark Lord Cometh - Part ll

programme.title: Stage Stars
programme.desc: With Halloween approaching, the Year 7s have been told about the school ghost and set off to hunt for it. Meanwhile, the Anything Goes cast try not to get too spooked by the thought of opening night for their show, and Encore - the most senior dancers at the school - warm up for their next big show.

programme.title: Cooking Buddies
programme.desc: Buddy gets creative with street artist Taye, and makes a homemade crispy chicken fakeaway.

programme.title: So Awkward
programme.desc: Its Humanitarian Week and the pupils have to commit to acts of charity and kindness in order to receive Community Spirit Awards. Ollie and Martha get competitive, signing up to teach digital to the over-60s.

programme.title: Danny and Mick
programme.desc: Danny is convinced its Joys birthday and ropes Mick and Naomi into his plan to create a surprise party. Micks in charge of decorations, Naomis in charge of the cake, Dannys in charge of making sure Joy doesnt suspect a thing. What can go wrong? Everything, its Danny and Mick! Soon its time to spring the surprise, will Joy be thrilled, annoyed or simply confused? Hint: Its all three!

programme.title: Danny and Mick
programme.desc: Naomi has asked for a raise, Joys advised her to take some time off to think about it, which is why Danny and Mick are in charge of the cafe. Theyve just about got the hang of it when a new automated smoothie maker arrives. The machine is supposed to make life easier, but thats not how Danny and Mick see it. Soon smoothies are flying, and everyone is left with egg on their face.

programme.title: Bros in Control
programme.desc: When Kenny and Adam are sent Wild West costumes and a list of challenges, they must do all they can to become top class cowboys. They need to prove who can swing the best lasso, fire a water pistol fastest, and drink the most juice in the bar slide challenge. Yeehaw! Then, once the dust has settled on the Old West, the bros go head to head again... exercising, in a contest to see who can produce the most sweat!

programme.title: Gladiators: Epic Pranks
programme.desc: Nitro pranks Apollo with fake influencer Aubry Devonne Keep, causing a big splash! And the other Gladiators have fun behind the scenes, pranking the audience at the Arena.

programme.title: Deadly 60
programme.desc: Steve is in Uganda, getting up close and personal with some of our closest relatives - the primates. He meets gorillas in the mountains, squabbling baboons on the savannah and even has a dawn encounter with chimps in the forest.

programme.title: Operation Ouch!
programme.desc: Dr Chris and Dr Xand investigate whether farts could power a rocket.

programme.title: Horrible Histories
programme.desc: Horrible Histories favourite, Death of `Stupid Deaths fame presents his very own show crammed full of spooky highlights. We join him at home and get a good look around as he reveals his creepiest moments. Then later on, Death himself is joined by some rather creepy friends to sing about his favourite scary things.

programme.title: Horrible Science
programme.sub-title: Sizzling Monks, Algorithms and Weather Frogs
programme.desc: Dr Big Brain has an electrical short circuit, Marie Curie is wowed by a rocket man, some of the great women of science are celebrated, and 200 monks get electrocuted!

programme.title: Bing
programme.desc: Bing and Sula find a helium balloon stuck in a tree in the park. They both want to play with it at the same time so Flop makes two strings and they invent a noisy balloon game called stuck duckies. When they run in opposite directions the balloon flies away, and Flop volunteers to be the stuck duckie so the game doesnt have to end.

programme.title: Bing
programme.desc: While looking for things to sell in their shop, Bing and Sula find their old friend Mr Rainybow, but his head is completely gone. So they decide to sell him, and after a nice lady buys his stacky bit for her toilet rolls, they look for some more things to sell. But then they find Mr Rainybows head and are sad that they cant get the rest of him back. However, Charlie loves to knock down Mr Rainybows rings.

programme.title: Andys Aquatic Adventures
programme.sub-title: Andy and the Fur Seal Pup
programme.desc: Mr Hammond is on a wildlife trip in New Zealand, and Andy is eager to hear what animals he has spotted. Jen and Andy call Mr Hammond from the Aqua Base, who answers their call standing in a river, wearing full fishing gear.

programme.title: Ranger Hamzas Eco Quest
programme.desc: Ranger Hamza and the Ramblers discover how earthworms play such an important role in the environment. They find out that earthworms keep the soil healthy by digging through it and eating things like dead leaves and twigs, which helps return nutrients to the soil. They learn that earthworms can be food for other animals too. On the way, they dig for worms before watering the plants with nutritious worm juice.

programme.title: Steve and Aneeshwar Go Wild
programme.desc: Steve and Aneeshwar meet a hungry giant anteater and feed him his breakfast in a long tube so they can see his superlong nose and tongue. Next, they go to see a group of chimpanzees who are also having breakfast and making lots of noise at the same time! Steve and Aneeshwar find out how these two very different animals have something in common.

programme.title: Dodges Pup School
programme.desc: On show and tell day, Bertie shares with the class why he loves gardening.

programme.title: Octonauts
programme.desc: When Captain Barnacles and most of the crew are unable to return to base, its up to Peso and Tweak to remove a stuck Hermit Crab from its shell.

programme.title: Vida the Vet
programme.desc: Tidbit gets a mosquito bite on picture day, and he doesnt want a photo. However, Vida has an idea.

programme.title: Go Jetters

programme.title: Love Monster

Maddie wears some special shoe attachments to show us how the diggers tracks work to stop it sinking into the soil. Then she attaches a special camera to the digger, to see it in action as it lifts the soil high into the dumper truck! Next, she visits a wellie factory to see how wellies are made.

programme.title: Mojo Swoptops

programme.desc: Young DJ and his pals set out to discover what bloodcurdling secrets lie behind the front door of the scary house across the street. When the house comes alive and starts eating people, have the kids bitten off more than they can chew?

programme.title: Hotel Transylvania: Transformania
programme.desc: Van Helsings new invention transforms Drac and the pack into humans, and Johnny into a monster. With their new mismatched bodies, Drac and the pack must find a way to switch themselves back before their transformations become permanent.

programme.title: Channel 4 News
programme.desc: Includes sport and weather.

programme.title: Edward VIII Britains Traitor King
programme.desc: For the first time the extent of the Duke of Windsors treachery during World War II is revealed, not just sympathising with the enemy but, as new evidence reveals, actively collaborating.

programme.title: Guy Martin: The British Train That Changed the World
programme.desc: To celebrate 200 years of rail travel, Guy helps rebuild the worlds most important train as he joins a recreation of the first ever passenger rail ride.

programme.title: Hunted
programme.desc: Two of the fugitives plunge headlong into a high-stakes race against the hunters. Another pair of runners head for home for a family get together that leaves them horribly exposed.

programme.title: Last Night in Soho
programme.desc: An aspiring fashion designer is mysteriously able to enter the 1960s, where she encounters a dazzling wannabe singer. However, the glamour is not all it appears to be, and the dreams of the past start to crack and splinter into something far darker.

programme.title: Formula 1
programme.desc: Will McLaren continue their winning streak, or will Max Verstappen strike back in style? F1 heads to one of the worlds most vibrant cities to find out. With Ariana Bravo and Alice Powell.

programme.title: Worlds Apart
programme.desc: Five teams remain in the race for £50k as the treasure hunt continues in Hiroshima. Partnerships are pushed to breaking point, and another duo are ditched at a dramatic coin count.

programme.title: Ramsays Hotel Hell
programme.desc: Gordon Ramsay checks into Murphys Historic Hotel near Sacramento in northern California, where owners Brian, Kevin and Joel are often too distracted by the party going on in the rowdy bar to look after their hotel.

programme.title: Sau Din Saas Ke
programme.desc: Based on the tyrany of a mother-in-law with her sons and daughters-in-law, the film tells the story of how she mends her ways.

programme.title: Cinebuzz
programme.desc: The host interviews various media personalities, shares the latest news of the Bollywood industry and reviews the newest movies.

programme.title: Hasee Toh Phasee
programme.desc: Shes smart, but shes also quirky, geeky and a magnet for trouble. And, thats exactly what makes Nikhil fall for his fiancees sister, Meeta. With so many hurdles, their love seems set for disaster.

programme.title: Kacchey Limbu
programme.desc: A pair of cricket-obsessed siblings struggle to balance family expectations with their own passions. Their rivalry grows when the brother challenges his sister to compete against him in a cricket competition.

programme.title: Awara Paagal Deewana
programme.desc: A chaos of relationships and interchanging couples and a pursuit for diamonds.

programme.title: Hum Dil De Chuke Sanam
programme.desc: A student musicians romance with his mentors daughter is jeopardised by an arranged marriage.

programme.title: Queen
programme.desc: A Delhi girl from a traditional family sets out on a solo honeymoon after her marriage gets cancelled.

programme.title: OMG Oh My God
programme.desc: Kanjibhai tries to take down God after his shop is destroyed in an earthquake.

programme.title: Heroes
programme.desc: Two film students embark on a trip to make a documentary stressing on why not to join Indian Defence Forces. However, by the end of their project, their perspective goes through a paradigm shift.

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One With Chandler in a Box

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One Where Theyre Going to Party!
programme.desc: Monica upsets Phoebe by stopping the catering business before it has started after she gets the head chef job at a restaurant where the staff all hate her, and Rachels boss is killed in a car accident before she can make Rachel a junior buyer.

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One With the Girl From Poughkeepsie
programme.desc: Ross struggles to maintain a long-distance relationship, Chandlers well-intended attempts to get Rachel a date seem to miss the mark, and Monicas plan to assert some authority at her new restaurant goes awry.

programme.title: Friends
programme.desc: Phoebes half-brother makes an astounding announcement and a thought-provoking request, while Joey finds himself in a class struggle.

programme.title: Friends
programme.desc: Phoebe undergoes an embryo implant procedure to become a surrogate mother for her brother and his wife, and Monica and Rachel wager their apartment in a trivia game against Chandler and Joey.

programme.title: Friends
programme.desc: Rachel schemes to get a handsome client to ask her on a date, while Chandlers jealousy causes problems with his girlfriend. Elsewhere, after losing a bet, Monica and Rachel must swap their apartment with Chandler and Joeys.

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One With Joeys Dirty Day
programme.desc: Charlton Heston finds Joey in a compromising position during a movie shoot. Meanwhile, Rachel regrets asking Ross for a favour, as he ends up spending the weekend in a Vermont cabin with Emily.

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One With All the Rugby
programme.desc: Ross takes up rugby to impress Emily, and Chandler sets up a ruse to avoid his former girlfriend Janice.

programme.title: Beethoven
programme.desc: Warm-hearted tale about an all-American family who adopt a loveable puppy, little realising that the creature will grow into a 185-pound St Bernard. As Beethoven grows ever larger, the father becomes hostile, but the whole family rallies together when an evil dog-napper menaces their pet.

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One With the Fake Party
programme.desc: Rachel throws a surprise party for Emily so she can invite Joshua; Phoebe develops a craving for meat.

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One With the Free Porn
programme.desc: Ross acts on Monicas advice and tells Emily that he loves her just before her departure for London. Unfortunately Emilys immediate response isnt exactly reassuring. Elsewhere, Phoebe receives some rather surprising news about her pregnancy, while Chandler and Joey are glued to their TV for fear of losing the free pornography channel they are suddenly receiving.

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One With Rachels New Dress
programme.desc: Ross has concerns about Emilys interests, and Rachels plans for Joshua are upset by a late change of venue.

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One With All the Haste
programme.desc: Ross tries to keep Emily from returning to London, and Monica and Rachel attempt to win back their apartment.

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One with All the Wedding Dresses
programme.desc: Distraught over Rosss engagement, Rachel suggests to Joshua that he marry her, even though theyve only been on four dates. Meanwhile, Monica and Phoebe pick up Emilys wedding dress from a bridal shop, but Monica tries it on and loves it so much she wont take it off. Phoebe also buys one for herself.

programme.title: Friends
programme.desc: Rachel and Ross reminisce separately about when they dated each other, and the friends get invitations to Rosss wedding, but not all of them are going.

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One With the Worst Best Man Ever
programme.desc: Chandler and Joey vie for the position of best man for Ross wedding ceremony. Ross chooses Joey after Chandler inadvertently insults Ross, but Joey loses Ross treasured wedding ring. Elsewhere, Phoebe suffers extreme mood swings because of her pregnancy.

programme.title: Friends
programme.desc: Rachel, Monica, Joey, Chandler and Ross go to London for the wedding where Joey meets Sarah Ferguson, the Duchess of York.

programme.title: Friends
programme.desc: Rachel frantically tries to get to London to tell Ross that she loves him before he marries Emily. Meanwhile, Ross mother, Judy, and father, Jack, argue with Emilys parents, Steven and Andrea Waltham.

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One After Ross Says Rachel
programme.desc: Ross has married Emily, but during the reception she punches him and flees. Meanwhile, new lovers Monica and Chandler are finding it hard to keep their agreement.

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One With All the Kissing
programme.desc: Rosss new wife wont speak to him, Rachel appoints Monica her adviser in romance, and Phoebe feels neglected.

programme.title: Friends
programme.desc: Phoebe prepares to give birth but the doctor makes her nervous, Joey experiences his own pain, and Monica plans to go out on a date with a male nurse to spite Chandler.

programme.title: Man v Food

programme.title: Man v Food
programme.desc: Casey Webbs palate-expanding pilgrimage takes him to Orlando for a hunger-slaying sandwich, a famous footlong and an 8.5 pound team challenge so big that he calls in backup from hometown hero and heartthrob Joey Fatone.

programme.title: Jamies Great Britain
programme.desc: Jamie travels to Yorkshire, uncovering how the Industrial Revolution, and the need for immigrant workers, changed everything from the people on our streets to the food on our plates. Jamie starts at the Kings Arms pub in the village of Heath where huge Yorkshire puddings are washed down with pints of ale. In Leeds, home to the third-largest Jewish community in Britain, Jamie samples chicken soup and smoked fish.

programme.title: James Martins Islands to Highlands
programme.desc: James returns home to his native Yorkshire, where he is joined by good friend and multi award-winning chef Brian Turner. James visits top chef Frances Atkins beautiful restaurant the Yorke Arms, where he enjoys her signature dish al fresco, in her unusual dining room the Onion. Brian tastes the delights of some Yorkshire charcuterie, and later they both take time out, where James brushes up his clay pigeon skills and Brian is challenged to some off-road driving.

programme.title: James Martins Islands to Highlands
programme.desc: James visits the stunning Lake District, where he is joined by top Michelin-starred chef Clare Smyth. James visits Clares meat suppliers the Lake District Farmers, while Clare learns the secret of the Lake Districts famous sticky toffee pudding. They both visit the Windermere Jetty Museum, and are treated to a trip out on Lake Windermere on a traditional steam-powered boat.

programme.title: The Great British Bake Off
programme.desc: `The Great British Bake Off makes its debut on Channel 4 as the series returns for an eighth season with 12 budding bakers competing to be crowned the champion. Established judge Paul Hollywood is joined by food connoisseur Prue Leith, while seasoned entertainers Sandi Toksvig and Noel Fielding take on the role of being the shows hosts. Despite the change in personnel, the key Bake Off traditions remain intact, as the contestants try to impress the panel with a fine selection of beautifully-crafted and delicious cakes, tarts, breads and more.

programme.desc: Its Bread Week, with the 10 bakers having much to prove with a fruity teatime Signature, a rather international-flavoured Technical, and an ambitious Showstopper.

programme.title: The Great British Bake Off
programme.desc: Its Dessert Week and the bakers must create a cracking meringue Signature, a wobbly Technical, and a complex chocolate Showstopper that promises to reveal all.

programme.title: James Martins American Adventure
programme.desc: James Martin drives into New Orleans in a 1970s Pontiac as he continues his American Adventure. Hes in for a massive foodie hit in the city known as `The Big Easy. After delving into a roadside seafood market, James cooks in the famous Louis Armstrong Park and meets singer Robin Barnes, who is nicknamed `The Songbird of New Orleans.

programme.title: James Martins American Adventure
programme.desc: Louisianas lush plantation country is the next stop on James Martins American Adventure. Famous for its sugar production, the area boasts beautiful plantation houses that are rich in history. James arrives in style in a red Mustang and visits historic Houmas House, where he cooks in the houses beautiful gardens, before sampling the local speciality of gumbo at the hands of the houses resident chef.

programme.title: James Martins American Adventure
programme.desc: James Martins American Adventure continues with a drive towards Louisianas swamplands, where he ditches his car for a high-speed boat! The unique watery wonderland provides James with the perfect location to cook a stunning recipe. All he has to do is make sure that he avoids the alligators! James also discovers nearby Lafayette, a city with a great foodie legacy, where he visits family-run smokehouse Johnsons Boucaniere.

programme.title: James Martins American Adventure
programme.desc: James continues with a trip to an island thats not actually an island. Avery Island is a large salt mound and the home of the chili peppers that are used to make Tabasco sauce. James meets the family who farm the peppers, make the sauce and run the Tabasco company, and hes even granted access to the pepper fields to cook two amazing dishes.

programme.desc: In the third series, the search for Britains best amateur baker is back as 12 passionate baking fans compete for the title. Mel Giedroyc and Sue Perkins return as presenters, as do judges Mary Berry and Paul Hollywood, who devise the three challenges faced by the competitors each week. They incorporate a signature bake, which tests the bakers personality and creative flair; a technical bake, which tests experience; and a showstopper bake, during which the bakers are able to showcase their depth of skill and talent. Berry and Hollywood inspect, prod and sample the baked goodies as they decide who gets to have their cake - and eat it.

Recalling fun days out with the McCartney family when she was little and how Grandad Mike turned every opportunity into a comedy show, Emily sets out to find out more about her showbiz genes.

programme.title: Who Do You Think You Are?

He hopes discovering more about his ancestors will help him strengthen his sense of identity and belonging. programme.title: Long Lost Family: Born Without Trace
programme.desc: Foundlings are people who were abandoned as babies, often in the first hours and days of their lives. Born without a trace, they have had no way to unlock the secrets of their past. By combining new DNA technology with painstaking detective work, the mysteries of people with unknown beginnings who are desperate for answers can now be solved. Presented by Davina McCall and Nicky Campbell, the team behind `Long Lost Family use an extraordinary new technique to try and identify birth families and find answers for people who have spent decades trying to find out where they came from.

programme.desc: The Hound is judged by the gods; Jaime is judged; Jon proves himself; Robb is betrayed; Tyrion learns the cost of weddings.

programme.title: Game of Thrones
programme.desc: Tywin plans unions for the Lannisters; Melisandre visits the Riverlands; Robb wants to repair his alliance with House Frey; Roose Bolton makes a decision about Jaime Lannister; Jon, Ygritte and the Wildlings face a formidable climb.

programme.title: Game of Thrones
programme.sub-title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
programme.desc: Dany exchanges gifts with a slave lord; Sansa worries about her prospects; Shae is irritated with Tyrions new situation; Tywin counsels the king; Melisandre reveals a secret; Brienne faces a formidable foe.

programme.title: Game of Thrones
programme.desc: A wedding is held at Kings Landing; Tyrion and Sansa spend the night together; Dany meets the Titans Bastard; Davos demands proof; Sam and Gilly meet an older gentleman.

programme.title: True Detective
programme.desc: The lives of police detectives as they chase criminals, using unconventional methods. The officers struggle to gain control of their own personal demons as they attack different cases.

programme.title: The Wire
programme.desc: Daniels and McNulty attempt to continue the case; Freamon and Bunk try to trace a crucial call; Pearlman and McNulty celebrate a break in the case.

programme.title: Succession
programme.desc: The saga of a fictional, American global-media family that is not only rich and powerful but also powerfully dysfunctional.

programme.title: IT: Welcome to Derry
programme.desc: Following the events in the 1960s, the time leading up to the events of the first film in the Stephen King "It" series.

programme.title: IT: Welcome to Derry
programme.desc: Following the events in the 1960s, the time leading up to the events of the first film in the Stephen King "It" series.

programme.title: Superman Returns
programme.desc: The Man of Steel returns to Earth after a five-year absence to find Lex Luthor ready to take over the world, and Lois Lane shacked up with a new man and a kid. The people have lost faith in their former saviour. Can Superman save their lives and regain their trust?

programme.title: Sky Cinema Preview
programme.desc: Previews of the great films now playing on Sky Cinema plus other highlights showing on Sky.

programme.title: The Magnificent Seven
programme.desc: A Mexican village is at the mercy of Calvera, the leader of a band of outlaws. The townspeople, too afraid to fight for themselves, hire seven American gunslingers to free them from the bandits raids. The professional gunmen train the villagers to defend themselves, then plan a trap for the evil Calvera.

programme.title: Shazam!
programme.desc: Billy Batson is a streetwise 14-year-old who can magically transform into the adult superhero Shazam simply by shouting out one word. His newfound powers soon get put to the test when he squares off against the evil Dr. Thaddeus Sivana.

programme.title: The Patriot
programme.desc: A widowed farmer, with a brave but brutal military past, decides not to join up when the British arrive in 1776. However, when his son enlists and is later captured by the enemy, the former soldier must abandon his new-found pacifist principles in order to rescue his oldest child, and forms a regiment of Carolina patriots, whose guerrilla tactics prove pivotal to the US war effort.

programme.title: Kraven the Hunter
programme.desc: Kravens complex relationship with his ruthless father starts him down a path of vengeance, motivating him to become not only the greatest hunter in the world, but also one of its most feared.

programme.title: Snakes on a Plane
programme.desc: An FBI agent must contend with a swarm of deadly serpents that have been released aboard an airliner to kill the witness he is escorting to trial.

programme.title: Bad Boys II
programme.desc: Loose-cannon cops Lowrey and Burnett reduce Miami to rubble as they try to stop Cuban and Russian drug smugglers from flooding Florida with ecstasy.

programme.title: Furiosa: A Mad Max Saga
programme.desc: Snatched from the Green Place of Many Mothers, young Furiosa gets caught in the crossfire of two tyrannical warlords. As the tyrants fight for dominance, Furiosa soon finds herself in a nonstop battle to make her way home.

programme.title: Midnight Run
programme.desc: A gruff cop turned bounty hunter captures a fugitive accountant accused of fraud and sets off from New York for Los Angeles to collect his prize. However, he is unaware that both the Mafia and the FBI are also on the accountants trail and hot on their heels.

programme.title: Twilight of the Warriors: Walled In
programme.desc: The notorious Kowloon Walled City serves as a fortified, lawless safe haven for gangs and refugees alike. But when a skilled underground fighter runs afoul of the most feared Triad boss in Hong Kong.

programme.title: Money Train
programme.desc: A pair of transit policemen decide to raid a New York subway train loaded with money. Foster brothers John and Charlie have held a lifelong fantasy of robbing the networks money train, which collects millions of dollars each night from the citys subway stations. In addition to trying to deceive their boss, the boys must also contend with a beautiful new decoy cop.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda 2
programme.desc: Po must unlock secrets of his past in order to defeat a formidable villain who plans to wipe out kung fu and conquer China. A DreamWorks animation.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda 3
programme.desc: After reuniting with his long-lost father, Po must train a village of clumsy pandas to help him defeat a supernatural warrior who becomes stronger with each battle.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda
programme.desc: Po might just be the laziest, clumsiest panda in the Valley of Peace, but he secretly dreams of becoming a kung fu legend. When the villainous snow leopard Tai Lung threatens Pos homeland, the hapless panda is chosen to fulfil an ancient prophecy and defend the Valley from attack. Training under Master Shifu, Po embarks on an epic high-kicking adventure as he sets out to thwart Tai Lungs evil plans. A DreamWorks animation.

programme.title: Nutty Professor II: The Klumps
programme.desc: Sherman is getting married to Denise Gains but his alter-ego Buddy Love keeps breaking through. Determined to rid himself of his pesky partner, he extracts Buddys genes, but an accident and a dog hair see Buddy take on his own life. Unaware of his existence, Sherman and Denise perfect their new rejuvenation formula and their fortune seems assured until Buddy steals it.

programme.title: Sky Cinema Preview
programme.desc: Previews of the great films now playing on Sky Cinema plus other highlights showing on Sky.

programme.title: Twins
programme.desc: Two very different twin brothers were born as a result of a genetic experiment. Following their birth, the flawless Julius grew up on a paradise island, while the less-than-perfect Vincent was sent to an orphanage. Now, many years later, Vincent is a thief and con man with huge debts. What will Julius think when he searches for his long-lost twin and finds him in jail?

programme.title: Parenthood
programme.desc: An over-protective dad, determined to do a better job than his own distant father, anxiously dotes on his troubled eight-year-old son. His brother, meanwhile, strives to mould his toddler daughter into an academic high-flyer, and his sister struggles with two rebellious, angst-ridden teenagers.

programme.title: The Men Who Stare at Goats
programme.desc: A reporter in Iraq may just have the story of a lifetime when he meets Lyn Cassady, a guy who claims to be a former member of the US Armys New Earth Army, a unit that employs paranormal powers in their missions.

programme.title: Mamma Mia!
programme.desc: Set on a Greek island, a young woman who is about to be married suspects that any one of three men could be her father. She invites them all to her wedding without telling her mother. Movie adaptation of the musical, set to Abbas greatest hits.

programme.title: Mamma Mia! Here We Go Again
programme.desc: In 1979 Donna falls in love with Sam while embarking on a series of adventures throughout Europe. In the present day, Donnas pregnant daughter reunites with her mothers old friends and boyfriends on the Greek island of Kalokairi.

programme.title: The Holdovers
programme.desc: Forced to spend Christmas break with a handful of students, a curmudgeonly instructor at a New England prep school develops an unlikely bond with a brainy troublemaker and the head cook.

programme.title: Just Friends
programme.desc: An LA record producer returns to his New Jersey hometown ten years after being rejected by his high-school cheerleader crush. Having made the transformation from no-hope geek to Greek god womaniser and with his friend still single, he embarks on a second seduction strategy that does not always go to plan.

programme.title: Ace Ventura: When Nature Calls
programme.desc: Sequel about the zany private detective who specialises in locating missing pets. Ace Ventura travels to Africa to search for a kidnapped sacred albino bat, which reputedly has the power to restore peace between two warring tribes.

programme.title: Love Actually
programme.desc: Weaving in and out of the love lives of eight loosely inter-related couples. The bachelor Prime Minister falls for his personal assistant, his brother-in-law is flirting with one of his colleagues, a writer heads off to France and pursues an affair with a maid, and an 11-year-old boy asks his father for advice on matters of the heart.

programme.title: Nacho Libre
programme.desc: Brother Ignacio is an orphanage chef who cooks up a plan to earn money for the kids by becoming a Mexican wrestling star. First, he must don a leotard.

programme.title: Pixels
programme.desc: Video game experts are recruited by the military to fight 1980s-era video game characters whove attacked New York.

programme.title: Pixels
programme.desc: Video game experts are recruited by the military to fight 1980s-era video game characters whove attacked New York.

programme.title: Pixels
programme.desc: Video game experts are recruited by the military to fight 1980s-era video game characters whove attacked New York.

programme.title: Scent of a Woman
programme.desc: Frank is a retired Lt Col in the US army. Hes blind and impossible to get along with. Charlie is at school and is looking forward to going to university; to help pay for a trip home for Christmas, he agrees to look after Frank over thanksgiving. Franks niece says this will be easy money, but she didnt reckon on Frank spending his Thanksgiving in New York.

programme.title: Paper Moon
programme.desc: A Depression-era con man becomes the unwilling temporary guardian of a precocious nine-year-old orphan.

programme.title: El Dorado
programme.desc: Gunslinger Cole Thornton rides into a small town to work for a cattle baron, but quits after learning that his would-be employer wants to drive a family off their land and obtain their water supply. Thornton leaves the situation unresolved, but a chance encounter takes him back to El Dorado, where he joins the sheriff in a range war.

programme.title: The Bridges at Toko-Ri
programme.desc: A conflicted Navy pilot and veteran of the Second World War questions the role he is forced to play when he is called back into service for the Korean War.

programme.title: About Time
programme.desc: After discovering that he can travel through time, a young man uses his ability to win the woman of his dreams and save his friend from professional disaster.

programme.title: There Will Be Blood
programme.desc: Ruthless silver miner, turned oil prospector, Daniel Plainview moves to oil-rich California. Using his adopted son HW to project a trustworthy, family-man image, Plainview cons local landowners into selling him their valuable properties for a pittance. However, local preacher Eli Sunday suspects Plainviews motives and intentions, starting a slow-burning feud that threatens both their lives.

programme.title: The Fisher King
programme.desc: When a DJs sardonic exhortation to a late-night caller to wipe out a bar full of yuppies is taken literally, his world falls apart. Years later, on the point of suicide, he is saved by a similar casualty, a former medievalist whose wife was a victim of the bar bloodbath, and offered a chance for redemption by the mans quest for the Holy Grail.

programme.title: Dreamgirls
programme.desc: Following the adventures of The Dreamettes, an all-girl singing group. Theyre going nowhere fast until they meet fast-talking car salesman-come-manager who has ambitions to make a fortune selling black music to a white audience. He persuades them to become backing singers for James `Thunder Early, but the larger-than-life lead singer Effie White must step out of the spotlight in favour of the more image-friendly Deena Jones.

programme.title: Grease
programme.desc: High-spirited musical set in 1950s America, in which a girl and boy who met on the beach are unexpectedly reunited at high school. She cannot understand how different he has become. Can the leather-clad, tough-talking leader of the T-Birds really be the same person? Perhaps her new friends, the Pink Ladies, can help her win back his heart?

programme.title: Grease 2
programme.desc: When Rydell new boy Michael meets hot Pink Lady Stephanie he is instantly smitten, but Michaels a geek and top T-Bird Johnny wants Stephanie back. Will an image change help him get the girl?

programme.title: Elizabeth: The Golden Age
programme.desc: Elizabeth might have her royal rival Mary Queen of Scots in custody, but a far greater threat lies to the east: the Spanish Armada. Despite her reign of 30 years, Elizabeths hold on the English throne remains uncertain. Her kingdom lies in the shadow of mighty Spain, Philip IIs vast army and the Inquisition, but Elizabeth is undaunted.

programme.title: Love Actually
programme.desc: Weaving in and out of the love lives of eight loosely inter-related couples. The bachelor Prime Minister falls for his personal assistant, his brother-in-law is flirting with one of his colleagues, a writer heads off to France and pursues an affair with a maid, and an 11-year-old boy asks his father for advice on matters of the heart.

programme.desc: After discovering that he can travel through time, a young man uses his ability to win the woman of his dreams and save his friend from professional disaster.

programme.title: There Will Be Blood
programme.desc: Ruthless silver miner, turned oil prospector, Daniel Plainview moves to oil-rich California. Using his adopted son HW to project a trustworthy, family-man image, Plainview cons local landowners into selling him their valuable properties for a pittance. However, local preacher Eli Sunday suspects Plainviews motives and intentions, starting a slow-burning feud that threatens both their lives.

programme.title: The Fisher King
programme.desc: When a DJs sardonic exhortation to a late-night caller to wipe out a bar full of yuppies is taken literally, his world falls apart. Years later, on the point of suicide, he is saved by a similar casualty, a former medievalist whose wife was a victim of the bar bloodbath, and offered a chance for redemption by the mans quest for the Holy Grail.

programme.title: Dreamgirls
programme.desc: Following the adventures of The Dreamettes, an all-girl singing group. Theyre going nowhere fast until they meet fast-talking car salesman-come-manager who has ambitions to make a fortune selling black music to a white audience. He persuades them to become backing singers for James `Thunder Early, but the larger-than-life lead singer Effie White must step out of the spotlight in favour of the more image-friendly Deena Jones.

programme.title: Grease
programme.desc: High-spirited musical set in 1950s America, in which a girl and boy who met on the beach are unexpectedly reunited at high school. She cannot understand how different he has become. Can the leather-clad, tough-talking leader of the T-Birds really be the same person? Perhaps her new friends, the Pink Ladies, can help her win back his heart?

programme.title: Grease 2
programme.desc: When Rydell new boy Michael meets hot Pink Lady Stephanie he is instantly smitten, but Michaels a geek and top T-Bird Johnny wants Stephanie back. Will an image change help him get the girl?

programme.title: Elizabeth: The Golden Age
programme.desc: Elizabeth might have her royal rival Mary Queen of Scots in custody, but a far greater threat lies to the east: the Spanish Armada. Despite her reign of 30 years, Elizabeths hold on the English throne remains uncertain. Her kingdom lies in the shadow of mighty Spain, Philip IIs vast army and the Inquisition, but Elizabeth is undaunted.

programme.title: Love Actually
programme.desc: Weaving in and out of the love lives of eight loosely inter-related couples. The bachelor Prime Minister falls for his personal assistant, his brother-in-law is flirting with one of his colleagues, a writer heads off to France and pursues an affair with a maid, and an 11-year-old boy asks his father for advice on matters of the heart.

programme.title: Love Actually
programme.desc: Weaving in and out of the love lives of eight loosely inter-related couples. The bachelor Prime Minister falls for his personal assistant, his brother-in-law is flirting with one of his colleagues, a writer heads off to France and pursues an affair with a maid, and an 11-year-old boy asks his father for advice on matters of the heart.

programme.title: Fantastic Beasts: The Crimes of Grindelwald
programme.desc: Magizoologist Newt Scamander joins forces with young Albus Dumbledore to prevent the devious Gellert Grindelwald from raising pure-blood wizards to rule over all non-magical beings.

programme.title: Fantastic Beasts: The Secrets of Dumbledore
programme.desc: Professor Albus Dumbledore knows the powerful, dark wizard Gellert Grindelwald is moving to seize control of the wizarding world. Unable to stop him alone, he entrusts magizoologist Newt Scamander to lead an intrepid team of wizards and witches.

programme.title: Fantastic Beasts: The Crimes of Grindelwald
programme.desc: Magizoologist Newt Scamander joins forces with young Albus Dumbledore to prevent the devious Gellert Grindelwald from raising pure-blood wizards to rule over all non-magical beings.

programme.title: Fantastic Beasts: The Secrets of Dumbledore
programme.desc: Professor Albus Dumbledore knows the powerful, dark wizard Gellert Grindelwald is moving to seize control of the wizarding world. Unable to stop him alone, he entrusts magizoologist Newt Scamander to lead an intrepid team of wizards and witches.

programme.title: Harry Potter and the Philosophers Stone
programme.desc: Big-screen adaptation of the best-selling novel by JK Rowling about an 11-year-old boy living with his cruel aunt and uncle who learns that he is the orphaned son of powerful wizards. Harry is offered a place at Hogwarts, a prestigious boarding school for wizards, where he begins piecing together the mystery of his parents deaths with the help of his new-found friends.

programme.title: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
programme.desc: The second instalment of boy wizard Harry Potters adventures at Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry, based on the novel by JK Rowling. A mysterious elf tells Harry to expect trouble during his second year at Hogwarts, but nothing can prepare him for trees that fight back, flying cars, spiders that talk and deadly warnings written in blood on the walls of the school.

programme.title: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
programme.desc: Harry, Hermione and Ron return for a third year at Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry, but the school is under lockdown as notorious murderer Sirius Black has escaped from the jail of Azkaban and apparently has a score to settle with Harry. Hermione has a trick up her sleeve for getting to all her classes on time, which comes in handy in solving the latest mystery for the magical students.

programme.title: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
programme.desc: Harry is mysteriously selected to compete in the prestigious Triwizard Tournament, a thrilling competition that pits him against more experienced students from Hogwarts and two rival wizarding schools. Meanwhile, supporters of the evil Lord Voldemort send a shockwave of fear throughout the wizard community when their Dark Mark scorches the sky at the Quidditch World Cup, signalling a return to power.

programme.title: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
programme.desc: Harry is dismayed when the Ministry of Magic denies Voldemorts return and appoints a nasty new teacher at Hogwarts to keep an eye on Dumbledore. The new teachers constant meddling with the curriculum convinces the students that school cannot prepare them for the battle ahead, so they form a secret duelling club with Harry as their tutor.

programme.title: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
programme.desc: Harry and the gang confront the terrifying truth that Lord Voldemort is back and Hogwarts is in danger.

programme.title: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince

programme.title: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
programme.desc: Harry and the gang confront the terrifying truth that Lord Voldemort is back and Hogwarts is in danger.

programme.title: Last Action Hero
programme.desc: Eleven-year-old Danny is given a magic ticket by a strange projectionist and is transported into the cinema screen. Thanks to his advance knowledge of the plot, he is able to help his silver-screen hero out of an awkward situation and becomes his partner. Theres trouble in store for the unlikely duo when the villain tries to seize the magic ticket.

programme.title: Sky Cinema Preview
programme.desc: Previews of the great films now playing on Sky Cinema plus other highlights showing on Sky.

programme.title: Hondo
programme.desc: An embittered Indian scout attempts to escort a homesteaders wife and her son back to safety after her cowardly husband deserts her during an Apache attack. When she refuses to go, the scout stays on to help for a while and, over time, forms a strong bond with both her and her son.

programme.title: Billy Madison
programme.desc: Billy is the son of hotel chain magnate Brian Madison and expects to inherit the family fortune, but hes shocked when his father stipulates he wont unless he passes 12th grade in just 24 weeks. It will be tough, since he never passed 1st grade. Determined to prove his father wrong, Billy enrols at school.

programme.title: Raiders of the Lost Ark
programme.desc: Epic tale in which an intrepid archaeologist tries to beat a band of Nazis to a unique religious relic which is central to their plans for world domination. Battling against a snake phobia and a vengeful ex-girlfriend, Indiana Jones is in constant peril, making hairs-breadth escapes at every turn in this celebration of the innocent adventure movies of an earlier era.

programme.title: Indiana Jones and the Temple of Doom
programme.desc: Adventure sequel. Intrepid archaeologist Indiana Jones, on the trail of fortune and glory in Old Shanghai, is ricocheted into a dangerous adventure in India. With his faithful companion Short Round and nightclub singer Willie Scott, Indie goes in search of the magical Sankara stone, and uncovers an ancient evil which threatens all who come into contact with it.

programme.title: Indiana Jones and the Last Crusade
programme.desc: The intrepid explorer Indiana Jones sets out to rescue his father, a medievalist who has vanished while searching for the Holy Grail. Following clues in the old mans notebook, Indy arrives in Venice, where he enlists the help of a beautiful academic, but they are not the only ones who are on the trail, and some sinister old enemies soon come out of the woodwork.

programme.title: Superman
programme.desc: Portraying the early years of the man of steel, from his birth on the planet Krypton to his arrival on Earth and the first of his epic battles with the arch-criminal Lex Luthor. The superhero must prevent Luthors nefarious scheme to rearrange the west coast of America with the help of a couple of nuclear bombs.

programme.title: Superman II
programme.desc: Having fallen in love with Lois, Superman agrees to sacrifice his powers to be with her. His last act as a superhero has an unexpected side effect, when a bomb he hurls into space to save the Eiffel Tower accidentally releases the three villains trapped in the `Phantom Zone in the first `Superman movie. The super criminals set about conquering the Earth, while Clark sits helpless.

programme.title: Superman III
programme.desc: Clark Kents class reunion is disrupted when a villain forces a computer genius to help destroy Superman. Based on DC Comics characters.

programme.title: Superman IV: The Quest for Peace
programme.desc: World leaders want Superman to intervene in the arms race, but he is caught in a dilemma - having vowed never to interfere in history. He eventually agrees to destroy all nuclear weapons, but then comes face to face with the android Protean Man, Lex Luthors latest evil creation. Luthor wants to stoke up the arms race, and sees the android - made from Kryptonite - as the only way to stop Superman.

programme.title: Shane
programme.desc: A former gunslinger must strap on his six-shooter once again to defend homesteaders from a greedy cattle baron.

programme.title: Congo
programme.desc: A group set out on safari into the heart of the Congo. Each have their different reasons for the trip, but nothing could have prepared them for the greatest danger - a troop of intelligent killer apes.

programme.title: Congo

programme.title: Hotel Transylvania 2
programme.desc: Concerned that his half-human grandson isnt showing his vampire side, Dracula and his friends put the boy through a `monster-in-training boot camp just as Dracs old-school father decides to pay a visit.

programme.title: Hotel Transylvania 3: A Monster Vacation
programme.desc: Mavis surprises Dracula with plans for a fun-filled summer voyage on a monster cruise. As the pack starts enjoying colossal buffets and exotic excursions, Drac finds himself falling for the ships intriguing but dangerous captain. He soon learns that trying to balance family, friends and romance might just be too much to handle. even for the worlds most powerful vampire.

programme.title: The Adventures of Sharkboy and Lavagirl
programme.desc: Dreamer Max, ridiculed by his classmates, conjures up his perfect dreamworld - the Planet Drool, but his dream is more powerful than even he suspects, and his favourite dream superheroes, Sharkboy and Lavagirl, materialise on Earth. They bring news that an alien intelligence is threatening his beloved Planet Drool. Is it true, as Sharkboy and Lavagirl say, that only Max can stop it?

programme.title: The Portable Door
programme.desc: A man lands an internship at a mysterious London firm with unconventional employees, including the charismatic CEO who is incorporating modern corporate strategy into ancient magical practices.

programme.title: Shrek
programme.desc: The story of a reclusive green ogre called Shrek whose life of solitude is disrupted by a horde of refugees who have been banished by the evil Lord Farquaad. Determined to save his home, Shrek cuts a deal with the tyrant, who sets him a daunting task - if Shrek is ever to enjoy peace and quiet again, he must rescue Farquaads bride-to-be from a dangerous castle.

programme.title: Shrek 2
programme.desc: Ogre Shrek and his new wife Fiona are surprised to discover a letter from her parents, inviting them over for dinner. Fiona is eager to show off her new husband, but her parents dont yet know shes an ogre. Taking Donkey along, they set off for Far Far Away to visit them, but the trip is hampered by the jealousy of a wicked fairy godmother and her hired assassin, Puss in Boots.

programme.title: Shrek the Third
programme.desc: Shrek is just starting to settle down in his beloved swamp with his wife Fiona, but their mucky bliss doesnt last for long as word arrives that the ogres froggy father-in-law is about to croak. The very last thing Shrek wants is to become King, but with no other heir in sight, it looks like the grumpy green one is destined never to live quietly in the swamp again. A glimmer of hope appears in the form of heir Artie.

programme.title: Shrek Forever After
programme.desc: Looking for the days when he felt like a `real ogre, shrek makes an ill advised pact with Rumpelstiltskin. Banished to a Shrek-less version of the land of Far Far Away, the unfortunate ogre must once again win the love of Princess Fiona if hes to ever get back home.

programme.title: Dog Man
programme.desc: A life-saving surgery fuses together a police officer and his faithful police dog -- and Dog Man is born. Learning to embrace his new identity, Dog Man must stop feline supervillain Petey the Cat from cloning himself and going on a crime spree.

programme.title: The Spiderwick Chronicles
programme.desc: Two twin brothers, Jared and Simon, and their sister Mallory are relocated by their mother to their great-great uncles creepy home in the middle of nowhere. Exploring, Jared finds his great-great uncles secret study and a book, the `Field Guide to the Fantastical World around Them, which opens up a world of goblins, spirits, ogres, trolls and griffins, some of whom are friendly and helpful and others not.

programme.title: Beetlejuice Beetlejuice
programme.desc: Still haunted by Beetlejuice, Lydias life gets turned upside down when her daughter discovers a portal to the afterlife. When someone says Beetlejuices name three times, the mischievous demon soon returns to unleash his very own brand of mayhem.

programme.title: The Witches
programme.desc: Creepy fairy tale following the fortunes of a young orphan who becomes embroiled in a supernatural adventure. Brought up on his kindly grandmothers scary stories about witches, he stumbles on a real coven while on holiday. Overhearing their plans to capture all the children in Britain, he sets out to stop them, remaining undeterred throughout - even when he has been turned into a mouse.

programme.title: Hotel Transylvania
programme.desc: Dracula, who operates a high-end resort away from the human world, goes into overprotective mode when a boy discovers the resort and falls for the counts teen-aged daughter.

programme.title: Lake George
programme.desc: Don is strong-armed by mobsters to execute a hit on Phyllis, but instead the two hatch a plan to steal money from the people who want her dead.

programme.title: It Feeds
programme.desc: A clairvoyant therapist confronts her own personal demons while trying to save a young girl who believes a malevolent entity is feeding on her.

programme.title: grow
programme.desc: An exuberant tale full of giant pumpkins, madcap characters and a little girl who just might be a pumpkin-growing savant. (2025, 107 mins)

programme.title: Dog Man
programme.desc: A life-saving surgery fuses together a police officer and his faithful police dog -- and Dog Man is born. Learning to embrace his new identity, Dog Man must stop feline supervillain Petey the Cat from cloning himself and going on a crime spree.

programme.title: Black Bag
programme.desc: When his beloved wife, Kathryn, is suspected of betraying the nation, intelligence agent George Woodhouse faces the ultimate test -- loyalty to his marriage or his country.

programme.title: Psycho Therapy: The Shallow Tale of a Writer Who Decided to Write About a Serial Killer

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror HD.uk
programme.title: Hollow Man
programme.desc: After years of experimentation, brilliant but arrogant scientist Sebastian Caine has discovered a way to make matter invisible. Determined to achieve the ultimate breakthrough, Caine pushes his team to move to the next phase - using himself as the subject. The test is a success, but when the process cant be reversed, Caine seems doomed to a future without flesh.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror HD.uk
programme.title: Sky Cinema Preview
programme.desc: Previews of the great films now playing on Sky Cinema plus other highlights showing on Sky.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror HD.uk
programme.title: Superman IV: The Quest for Peace
programme.desc: World leaders want Superman to intervene in the arms race, but he is caught in a dilemma - having vowed never to interfere in history. He eventually agrees to destroy all nuclear weapons, but then comes face to face with the android Protean Man, Lex Luthors latest evil creation. Luthor wants to stoke up the arms race, and sees the android - made from Kryptonite - as the only way to stop Superman.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror HD.uk
programme.title: I.S.S.
programme.desc: Tensions flare in the near future aboard the International Space Station when a worldwide conflict breaks out on Earth. Soon, the U.S. and Russian astronauts each receive orders from the ground: take control of the station by any means necessary.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror HD.uk
programme.title: Zombieland
programme.desc: Columbus and Tallahassee have orchestrated a way to survive a world overrun by zombies. With only fear keeping the `big wuss Columbus alive, Tallahassee wants to eradicate the `last Twinkie on Earth. The duo join forces with Wichita and Little Rock who have a style and tact of their own when it comes to dealing with the flesh-eating chaos.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror HD.uk
programme.title: Mad Max: Fury Road
programme.desc: An apocalyptic story set in the furthest reaches of our planet, in a stark desert landscape where humanity is broken. Two rebels on the run may be able to restore order.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror HD.uk
programme.title: A.I.: Artificial Intelligence
programme.desc: Futuristic version of the fairy tale `Pinocchio, about a highly advanced robotic child who longs to become a real boy so he can win back the love of his adoptive mother who abandoned him. He journeys through a violent, dystopian world in a quest for the Blue Fairy who has the power to make his dream come true.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror HD.uk
programme.title: Ready Player One
programme.desc: In 2045 the planet is on the brink of chaos and collapse, but people find salvation in the OASIS: an expansive virtual reality universe created by eccentric James Halliday. When Halliday dies, he promises his immense fortune to the first person to discover a digital Easter egg thats hidden somewhere in the OASIS. When young Wade Watts joins the contest, he finds himself becoming an unlikely hero in a reality-bending treasure hunt through a fantastical world of mystery, discovery and danger.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror HD.uk
programme.title: Godzilla
programme.desc: Godzilla, King of the Monsters, arises to combat massive, malevolent foes that have been feeding on a nuclear plants reactors and now threaten mankind with total annihilation.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror HD.uk
programme.title: Battleship
programme.desc: A fleet of ships is forced to do battle with an armada of unknown origins in order to discover and thwart their destructive goals.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror HD.uk
programme.desc: An epic adventure about a global cataclysm that brings an end to the world and tells of the heroic struggle of the survivors.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror HD.uk
programme.title: Monolith
programme.desc: While trying to salvage her career, a disgraced journalist begins investigating a strange conspiracy theory. However, as the trail leads uncomfortably close to home, shes left to grapple with the lies at the heart of her own story.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror HD.uk
programme.title: Event Horizon
programme.desc: After disappearing for seven years, revolutionary spaceship Event Horizon is rediscovered. The team of scientists sent to investigate find that the entire crew is dead, and a terrifying, malevolent presence is lurking on board.

programme.title: Goosebumps
programme.desc: A young kid teams up with the niece of young adult horror author R.L. Stine after the writers imaginary demons are set free on the town of Greendale, Maryland.

programme.title: Presence
programme.desc: A family becomes convinced they are not alone after moving into their new home in the suburbs.

programme.title: The Damned
programme.desc: Fighting for survival at an isolated fishing outpost, Eva and her crew are cursed after making the choice to not help a sinking ship off the coast. Facing the consequences, a darkness consumes them all, creating chaos and death at every turn.

programme.title: The Ring Two
programme.desc: Sequel to the cult horror about a videotape that brings death to anyone who watches it. The journalist from the original film destroys the tape but is pursued by the demon that cursed it and who now wants to possess her son. The Japanese director of the original directs this sequel.

programme.title: Ouija
programme.desc: A group of friends must confront their most terrifying fears when they awaken the dark powers of an ancient spirit board.

programme.title: Nosferatu
programme.desc: A new bride is left under the care of friends when her husband travels to Transylvania for a meeting with Count Orlok. Plagued by horrific visions and an increasing sense of dread, she soon encounters an evil force thats far beyond her control.

programme.title: Presence
programme.desc: A family becomes convinced they are not alone after moving into their new home in the suburbs.

programme.title: Get Out
programme.desc: A young photographer uncovers a dark secret when he meets his girlfriends seemingly friendly parents for the first time at their posh estate.

programme.title: Us
programme.desc: Accompanied by her husband, son and daughter, Adelaide Wilson returns to the beachfront home where she grew up as a child. Haunted by a traumatic experience from the past, Adelaide grows increasingly concerned that something bad is going to happen. Her worst fears soon become a reality when four masked strangers descend upon the house, forcing the Wilsons into a fight for survival. When the masks come off, the family is horrified to learn that each attacker takes the appearance of one of them.

programme.title: The Crazies
programme.desc: David Dutton is the sheriff of picture-perfect American town Ogden Marsh. One night and out of the blue one of its citizens shows up during a baseball game with a shot-gun and ready to kill. This is the beginning of a spiral of violence and mayhem.

programme.title: Lawless
programme.desc: Set in Depression-era Franklin County, Virginia, a bootlegging gang is threatened by a new deputy and other authorities who want a cut of their profits.

programme.title: The Bridge on the River Kwai
programme.desc: British POWs are ordered by their Japanese captors to construct a bridge of strategic importance and are happy to sabotage and delay the progress until their commanding officers orders them to continue the work unhindered to its completion, but are his actions tantamount to collaborating with the enemy?

programme.title: Zulu
programme.desc: A true story of two remaining officers desperately trying to rally their meagre force of 105 men against 4,000 attacking Zulu warriors. Cetewayo, ruler of the Zulu kingdom, begins his war against the white invaders with the annihilation of the British army at Isandhlwana and moves on to his next target - the depleted garrison at Rorkes Drift.

programme.title: Escape From Alcatraz
programme.desc: Fact-based story set in Americas former maximum-security prison, from which escape was supposed to be impossible. For habitual jailbreaker Frank Morris, however, Alcatraz is just another set of bars and walls that will never hold him.

programme.title: Now You See Me
programme.desc: A federal agent and an Interpol detective play a cat-and-mouse game with cunning illusionists who rob corrupt business leaders during their performances, then funnel the money to members of the audience.

programme.title: Collateral
programme.desc: After a long day, LA taxi driver Max is about to knock off when sharp-suited Vincent offers him $600 to make five stops. Sounds good until Vincent turns out to be a merciless hitman and each one of those stops involves a hit. As the night goes on, Max starts to wonder if hell live to see the sunrise, as the pair are hunted by the police and the FBI.

programme.title: Sherlock Holmes
programme.desc: Detective Sherlock Holmes and his stalwart partner Watson engage in a battle of wits and brawn with a nemesis whose plot is a threat to all of England.

programme.title: Sherlock Holmes: A Game of Shadows
programme.desc: The murder of Austrias crown prince leads Holmes, Watson and a Gypsy to a showdown with an evil genius named Moriarty.

programme.title: Jaws
programme.desc: Scary chiller about a coastal community plagued by a killer shark. With the summer tourist season at hand, the mayor is keen to keep the first attack hushed up. However, when an expert claims that the attacks are the work of a giant great white shark, there is only one solution - to kill the monster fish before it can feed again.

programme.title: The Krays
programme.desc: The disturbing story of the making of the infamous 60s underworld figures Reggie and Ronnie Kray - from their upbringing by a domineering mother in the deprivation of Londons East End. The gangland empire they build is characterised by violence and intimidation, and the film is unflinching in its depiction of their rise to power.

programme.title: Jack Reacher
programme.desc: A defence attorney hires an enigmatic ex-Army investigator to tackle the case of a highly trained sniper who apparently murdered five people at random.

programme.desc: Investigator Jack Reacher goes on the lam to uncover the truth behind a major government conspiracy that involves the death of U.S. soldiers.

programme.title: Animal Senses
programme.desc: The first sense to evolve in the first animals was chemoreception. It means being able to detect chemicals in the animals environment. This helps animals find prey and mates, and to sense predators from a distance.

programme.title: Animal Senses
programme.desc: The sense of touch is useful to feel physical forces such as bites, changes in temperature and texture. Some animals have become extra sensitive to feel very faint vibrations, which give them a lot of information about their environment.

programme.title: Animal Senses
programme.desc: Seeing the world is one of the most amazing animal adaptations. Different types of eyes give animals different types of vision, and in some cases they can be extraordinary.

programme.title: Animal Senses
programme.desc: Sound waves are produced by movement. Animals have evolved organs to detect those sound waves in the air or water to perceive movements in their environment. This can be used to find prey, predators, and mates. These are some of the animals that have mastered the sense of hearing.

programme.title: Animal Senses
programme.desc: Some animals have senses that humans cant even conceive. With those powers they can do marvellous things.

programme.title: Animal Senses
programme.desc: Humans have sharp senses, which we use explore our environment. Vibrations in the air, light, and chemicals in our food and in the air give us the information we need to survive. But some animals have taken those senses and, through evolution, turned them into marvels of biological engineering.
